name: authelia
tagline: An authentication server providing single sign-on and multi-factor access control
description: Authelia is an authentication and authorization server providing 2FA, SSO, and role-based access for web apps. It integrates with reverse proxies and supports LDAP, OAuth, and self-hosted identity management.

features.title: Authentication Server
features.description: Centralized auth for all your applications. Single sign-on

features.title: Two-Factor Authentication
features.description: Add 2FA security to any application. Enhanced protection

features.title: Reverse Proxy Integration
features.description: Works with Traefik, Nginx, and others. Easy integration

features.title: Oauth Integration
features.description: Modern authentication protocols supported. Standard compliance

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Complete control over authentication infrastructure. Security in your hands
